summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the organization of City government; creating an Office of Immigrant and Refugee Affairs; establishing the powers and duties of the Office of Immigrant and Refugee Affairs; renaming the Immigrant and Refugee Advisory Board to the Seattle Immigrant and Refugee Commission; establishing the responsibility to provide staffing for the Seattle Immigrant and Refugee Commission; amending Chapter 3.14 and repealing Sections 3.35.090, 3.35.100, 3.35.110, and 3.35.120 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
committee: Public Safety, Civil Rights, and Technology
